snippet: Germany's top lender Deutsche Bank is promoting two of its senior managers to deputy chief executives, complementing strategic adjustments and an 8 billion euro ($8.50 billion)capital raise....

headline.main: Liver Transplant Surgical Pioneer Dr. Thomas Starzl Dies
headline.print_headline: Liver Transplant Surgical Pioneer Dr. Thomas Starzl Dies

lead_paragraph: Germany's top lender Deutsche Bank is promoting two of its senior managers to deputy chief executives, complementing strategic adjustments and an 8 billion euro ($8.50 billion)capital raise.
